#jestemzAGH cotton bag

Cotton bag with the name of the #jestemzAGH initiative and a unique Knowledge Passion Bond tag. Large and capacious with a wide bottom and long, broad handles. Made of high-quality material. Made in Poland. The bag comes in two colours: black and beige. Opis produktu colour: black or beige print colour: white or black type of print: screen printing material: 100% cotton weight: 260 g dimensions: 36 × 41 × 10 cm

#jestemzAGH neck gaiter

A black neck gaiter. Multifunctional piece of clothing that can be worn throughout the year. Perfect for outdoor activities in autumn and winter. The details that make it unique include the #jestemzAGH inscription and a sateen tag with the Wiedza Pasja Więź motto. Made in Poland. #jestemzAGH T-shirt

A classic black, cotton, unisex T-shirt with short sleeves. The details that make it unique include inscriptions on the front and back of the T-shirt (#jestemzAGH ) and a sateen tag with the Wiedza Pasja Więź motto. Made of high-quality material. Made in Poland. Both models wear size S. Unisex style – women should consider selecting a smaller size to avoid the oversize effect.
